text: Pui Fan Lee (born 1969) is an English actress and television presenter. She is known for portraying Po in the original run of the children's television series Teletubbies between 1997 and 2001, and for presenting the CBeebies preschool education series Show Me Show Me. Lee is also known for being a CBeebies presenter from 2002 to 2009. == References == Category:Living people Category:Puppeteers Category:English television actors Category:English television presenters
title: Pui Fan Lee
